title: kalai inbamE
sahitya:
kalai inbamE nilaiyinbamAm kaviyinbamE amizhdinbamAm


anupallavi

  talaiyanbinAl tAi shaktiyE taru tIn-shuvai viriyainduN


caraNam    shuvai tEruvOr uLamE magizh sukham OngavE pozhi mEghamAm
(or) shuvai tEruvOr avai mIdinil sukhamOngiyE shori mEghamAm 
naviyEyilA nalanE viLai naravUriDum iraivAda shIrk-
